## LdmlKeyboardCompiler.compile() method

Transforms in-memory LDML keyboard xml file to an intermediate representation of a .kmx file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
compile(source: LDMLKeyboardXMLSourceFile, postValidate?: boolean): Promise<KMXPlus.KMXPlusFile>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | LDMLKeyboardXMLSourceFile | in-memory representation of LDML keyboard xml file |
|  postValidate | boolean | _(Optional)_ |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;KMXPlus.KMXPlusFile&gt;

KMXPlusFile intermediate file
